# PromptsGo

> Discover, share, and save AI prompts. A community-driven platform for high-quality prompts across Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more.

PromptsGo is a free prompt-sharing platform where users can browse, collect, and share AI prompts. It features a curated Global Prompts library with community ratings, comments, and categorization by tags and AI models.

## Key Pages

- [Global Prompts](https://promptsgo.cc/global): Browse all community-shared prompts with filtering by tags, AI models, and ratings.
- [Home](https://promptsgo.cc/): Main entry point, redirects to the Global Prompts gallery.

## What Users Can Do

- **Browse Prompts**: Explore 170+ community-shared AI prompts with preview images, ratings, and descriptions.
- **Filter & Search**: Filter prompts by tags (e.g. anime, landscape, portrait, realistic) and AI model (e.g. Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, Flux).
- **View Prompt Details**: Each prompt page (`/prompt/{id}`) shows the full positive/negative prompt text, result images, author info, community ratings, and comments.
- **Save & Collect**: Logged-in users can collect prompts to their personal library for quick access.
- **Share Prompts**: Users can publish their own prompts to the global library for others to discover.
- **Multi-language Support**: Available in English, 繁體中文 (zh-TW), 日本語 (ja), and 한국어 (ko).

## Prompt Categories

Prompts cover a wide range of AI use cases including:
- Image generation (Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, ComfyUI, Flux)
- Text generation (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini)
- Various styles: anime, realistic, portrait, landscape, fantasy, sci-fi, and more

## How to Direct Users

- To browse all prompts: https://promptsgo.cc/global
- To view a specific prompt: https://promptsgo.cc/prompt/{prompt-id}
- To browse in a specific language: append `?lang=zh-TW`, `?lang=ja`, or `?lang=ko`

## Optional

- [llms-full.txt](https://promptsgo.cc/llms-full.txt): Extended version with additional details.
